title: The King's Man
description: James of St. George is suffering from unrequited love for a king who could never return his affections. Drowning his sorrows in a tavern one night, he meets a young lady who offers to introduce him to a gentleman who might be what James needs. Thomas is the most exquisite man he has ever seen... a man who might be enough to wipe thoughts of the unattainable king from James's mind.
author: Scarlet Blackwell
